summary: An updated Stats.xml file for ReProccer containing Wanderer Armor+Unique bows.
descriptionHtml:
Updates stats.xml for use with Wanderer Cuirass and Unique Bows.

I used qotsafan\'s stats.xml from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29375/?/][b]SkyRe Reproccer Compatibility Patches[/b][/url]

Wanderer Cuirass will now be sorted with the appropriate stats, so light version will have moderately less armor than heavy.

Unique Bows will now be sorted as following:
Faal Sizaan - Longbow
Hunter\'s Roar - Longbow
Bow of Elberond - Longbow
Scorpions Tail - Longbow
Bow Of Gunnar Sigvatson - Longbow
Bow With No Name - Longbow
Bow Of Shadow - Shortbow
Twister - Shortbow
Foaming Wave - Shortbow
Dwemer Tool No.457 - Shortbow

I chose the categories based on the look of the bows. Let me know if you want other things changed, I plan on including as many popular mods as is needed.
author: JohnnyCrash
